Swelling of first metatarsophalangeal joint of hallux (disorder)

code.text: X-ray, bilateral feet, weightbearing, 2 views: dorsoplantar (DP) and axial

resource.conclusion: Bilateral bunions with hallux valgus deformity, moderate degenerative changes in the first metatarsophalangeal joint bilaterally, more pronounced on the right.
